verses.1: Jakehʼ tapa Agurʼ thugente: Amah in, “Pasian aw, ka lunggim a, ka cih nading ka thei kei hi.
verses.2: Ka hai lua a, mihing ka sun kei hi. Mihing bangin ngaihsut siamna ka nei kei hi.
verses.3: Pilna thu ka thei kei a, Pasianʼ thu ka theih om lo hi.
verses.4: Vantungah kua kah to a, leitungah kua hong kum sukkik ahi hiam? Kua in a khut sungah huihte lomcip a, puan tawh tuite tuncip ahi hiam? Kua in leitung bulpite phut kip ahi hiam? Tua bang mi na theih ngei leh a tapaʼ min bang ahi hiam?
verses.5: “Pasian in a thugen khempeuh a manna laktel a, amah a belte adingin kidalna lum ahi hi.
verses.6: Ama gen lohpi behlapsak kei in; na tua cih leh amah in nang hong tai-in zuau thu gen na hihna hong kilang ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.7: Pasian aw, thu nih kong ngen hi. Ka sih ma-in tuate hong pia in.
verses.8: Zuauna le khemna ka zat loh nadingin hong huh inla, a hau lua lo, a zawng lua loin hong bawl inla, ka khamkhop zah lian bek an hong pia in.
verses.9: Hau lua leng nang hong nialin, “ Topa i cih kua ahi hiam?” kong ci kha dinga, zawng lua leuleu leng miʼ na guksakin ka Pasianʼ min kong daisak khazel ding hi.
verses.10: Sila khat a topa kiangah gensia kei in; amah in nang hong gensia-in gimna na thuak kha ding hi.
verses.11: A pate samsia-in a min a daisak, a nute a phat lo mi pawl khat om hi.
verses.12: Amaute a nin mahmah hi napi-in amauʼ muhna ah siang a kisa mahmah mi pawl khat om hi.
verses.13: Mihoih pha mahmah in a kingaihsun, a kiliansak mahmah mi pawl khat om hi.
verses.14: A ha uh namsau tawh a kibang gam sung mizawngte a ne tum, mi cimawhte a liaktum mi pawl khat om hi.
verses.15: Vot in tanu nih nei a, khat in, “Hong pia in,” ci a, a khat in zong, “Hong pia in,” mah ci veve hi. “Pha zo ta,” a ci ngei lo nam thum om a, eh! li hizaw:
verses.16: Han khuk, taciing numei, tui a deih tawntung lei keu, le a kisumit zo lo meikuang.
verses.17: A pa a simmawh mipa, a nuʼ thu a mang nuam lo mipa, va-ak in a mittang khelkhiat sakin musanete in a sa ne ding uh hi.
verses.18: Ka theih zawh het loh a lamdang mahmah thu thum om a, eh! li hizaw:
verses.19: Vanah musane a leen theihna zia, suangpi tungah gul a pai theihna zia, tuipi tungah teembaw a pai theihna zia, le nungak tangval a kingaihna zia.
verses.20: A citak lo zi hih bangin gamta hi: Midang tawh khialin tua ciangin kisilsiang a, “Khialhna bangmah gamta kei ing,” ci khem hi.
verses.21: Leitung mi khempeuh in a thuak zawh loh thu thum, eh! thu li om a,
verses.22: sila khat kumpi a suah ciang, mihai khat in a duh bangbang a nek zawh ciang,
verses.23: a muhthadah huai numei khat in pasal a neih ciang, nasem numeino in a tonuʼ za a suan ciang.
verses.24: A neu mahmah ganhing nam li leitungah om a, ahi zongin a pil penpente ahi hi.
verses.25: Miksite: A hat het lo ganhing hi napi-in khuakhal sungin a nek ding uh khol zo uh hi.
verses.26: Ngalvangte: A thahat lo ganhing hi napi-in suang lakah a kua ding bawl uh hi.
verses.27: Kauphete: Kumpi nei lo napi-in a kituak diamdiamin hon tat thei uh hi.
verses.28: Innhikte: Khut sunga tawi zawh ganhing hi lel napi-in kumpi inn sungah teeng zo uh hi.
verses.29: A gamtatna i et ciangin a thupi suak mahmah thum, eh! li om hi.
verses.30: Humpinelkai: Ganhing lak pan a hat pen kuamah a kihta lo.
verses.31: Aklui: A kihisak pai kuankuan. Keeltal: A kihisak pai gangan. Kumpipa: A miteʼ mai ah a pai lanlan.
verses.32: Kiphasakin na hai pau ngei a, thusia bawl ding na ngaihsut ngei khak leh limtakin thu ngaihsun pha in.
verses.33: Bawngnawi toktok lehang thawhbat hong suak a, mi khatʼ nak tupsak lehang si hong luang a, mi phin lehang kitotna hong piang hi.
